bg-color.description: The background color is generally used when displaying text
bg-color.description_zh: 背景颜色，一般显示文字时用

src.description: The avatar path, if it fails to load, will display the default avatar
src.description_zh: 头像路径，如加载失败，将会显示默认头像

size.description: The size of the avatar can be a specified string (large, default, mini) or a numeric value in rpx
size.description_zh: 头像尺寸，可以为指定字符串(large, default, mini)，或者数值，单位rpx

mode.description: The display type is described above

text.description: Replace images with text, with levels taking precedence over src
text.description_zh: 用文字替代图片，级别优先于src

img-mode.description: The cropping type of the avatar image is the same as the mode parameter of the image component of uni, if the effect does not meet the requirements, you can try to pass the widthFix value
img-mode.description_zh: 头像图片的裁剪类型，与uni的image组件的mode参数一致，如效果达不到需求，可尝试传widthFix值

show-sex.description: Whether or not to display the gender icon in the upper right corner
show-sex.description_zh: 是否显示右上角的性别图标

sex-icon.description: The gender icon in the upper right corner can be passed in the image path, or the built-in icon name
sex-icon.description_zh: 右上角性别图标，可传入图片路径，或内置图标名

sex-bg-color.description: The background color of the gender icon

show-level.description: Whether to display the rank icon in the lower right corner
show-level.description_zh: 是否显示右下角的等级图标

level-icon.description: The level icon in the lower right corner can be passed in the image path or the built-in icon name
level-icon.description_zh: 右下角等级图标，可传入图片路径，或内置图标名

level-bg-color.description: The background color of the level icon

events.name: click
events.params: index: 用户传递的标识符
